descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#980000][size=5][size=6]Myrkrr[/size]
[color=#d9ead3]
Hi there, this battleaxe is inspired by a klingon weapon. A little on the shiny side ( your enemies will see you coming from miles away).
[/color][/size][/color][color=#d9ead3]
[size=5][size=5]
[/size]Location:  [/size]
[size=5][size=5]You will find it on a table at the very bottom of Valthume. Which is roughly south-east of Markarth. And if you haven't already just after the  entrance there is a mask quest available.

Craftable: Yes, at any forge under the daedric category.

Tempered: Yes, at any smithy wheel.

Damage: About the same as daedric battle axe

Screen shot: Armor used is [/size][/size][size=5][size=5]Vampire Rogue Armor by TheBlitz77 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61546/?[/size][/size]
[size=5][size=5]
[/size] [/size]
[/color][color=#d9ead3][size=5]Installation:
-Extract the contents(including folders) into your Skyrim game folder. Or use mod manager of choice.
[/size]

[size=4]Any questions and or comments are welcome. Thank you.[/size][/color]

[/center]
author: tarll
